label: Aids to Navigation
description: Assets that are used to aid navigation in the marine and fluvial environment.

label: Amenities
description: Assets that contribute to the accessibility or usability of a location.

label: Asset Complex
description: A grouping together of individual assets that can be considered as parts of a single site or complex with a high level purpose.

label: Beach Structure
description: Assets used to protect the coast from erosion.

label: Buildings and Compounds
description: Assets that are used to provide shelter for equipment, storage or personnel.

label: Channel Crossings
description: Assets that allow access across a channel.

label: Defence
description: Asset that provide flood defence or coastal protection functions. These include both man-made and natural defences. Natural defences may include man-made elements to make them more effective or protect them from erosion.

label: Information Deliverables
description:
Specific Information Deliverables scheduled in each project Information Delivery Plan (IDP) for each required delivery stage.
*File Naming Attributes and *Information Purposes are not specific information deliverables but list the allowable values for different parts of the file names, and the purposes for which the information may be used.
Similarly, *File Reader Form Templates and *Report Schemas provide definitions of column requirements to be used in deliverable files, and a schema definition of file metadata.

label: Instruments
description: Assets used to measure, monitor and communicate environmental or operational parameters.

label: Land
description: Areas of land that are involved in water management.

label: Mechanical and Electrical
description: Specialist mechanical, electrical, control and automation assets.

label: Public Safety
description: Environment Agency managed assets that are used in the protection of public safety.

label: Structure
description: Assets used to enable, restrict or affect the movement of water, people, fish, animals or materials.

label: Surface Water Management
description: Assets used to manage surface water.
